root.name: Tobe's Vertical Adventure
root.description: OverviewA classically styled 2D platformer released on Xbox Live Indie Games and PC. You play as either Toby or Nana hunting treasure and rescuing fluffy animals in 16 big caves across 4 worlds.PC System RequirementsOS:Windows XP, Vista, 7Processor:1.8GHzMemory:512 MB RAMGraphics:128 MB, Shader Model 2.0DirectXÂ®:9.0cHard Drive:200 MB HD spaceSound:Direct X9.0c compatible sound card
